item.title: Elon Musk’s Twitter updates app to start charging $7.99 monthly for Twitter Blue
item.description: Elon Musk’s Twitter updates app to start charging $7.99 monthly for Twitter Blue Twitter on Saturday updated its app in Apple’s App Store to begin charging $8 for sought-after blue check verification marks, in Elon Musk’s first major revision of the social media platform.
